entry.title: Julien added 'The Making of Casablanca: Bogart, Bergman, and World War II'
entry.content: ğŸ“š â€œThe Making of Casablanca: Bogart, Bergman, and World War IIâ€ by Aljean Harmetz â­ï¸ Rated: 4/5 ğŸ“ "How do you write a making-of book about one of the greatest films of all time when, famously, nothing chaotic ever happened on set? You write its biography instead. Aljean Harmetz has crafted a captivating and thoroughly researched work, not just about the making of Casablanca, but about the people who made it happen. From the producer to the set designer, the sound recordist to the costume team, and of course the director and actors, every layer is explored in depth. The book is filled with ins..." ğŸ·ï¸ #AljeanHarmetz
